title: League of Legends will now update your desktop icons

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: this message comes up every time I launch the client {{sticker:cass-cry}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

From what I can recall, this was what would appear during the initial migration to the LCU.

Could you try the following for me, let me know whether or not anything below resolves your issue.

* Launch the client as Administrator (Right click  > Run as Administrator)
* Download the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and run it with the "Force a repatch" option checked.

Hy! ^^
This was my problem too and i fix it fast.

(1...) Go to the Leauge of Legends library and find "LeagueClient.exe".
(2...) Then right click and send to the desktop.
(3...) If your shortcut looks like "LeagueClient.shortcut" or something else just rename it to -> "LeagueClient" 
(4...) Start League of Legends with this shortcut

(+...) If u don't need this shortcut u can delete.

Np. ;)

{{summoner:13}}
